meta.title: Canonical Global Sidebar Across Apps/Web Layout
meta.summary: Canonify sidebar behavior into a single shared layout-owned sidebar component used by all views on desktop and mobile, with centralized nav config, unique per-item icons, icon-mode overflow fixes, and nav-only scrolling.
goals: Unique icon per nav item globally
No sidebar overflow in icon mode
Header/footer fixed with only nav region scrollable
Same canonical behavior across desktop sidebar and mobile drawer
Storybook sidebar story consumes canonical config and behavior
